attributes.action: Increasingly restrictive measures being introduced without debate or discussion.
attributes.additional_details: Provide a comprehensive explanation of why rules are being introduced, the measures which are used and where levels of transmission etc need to drop to in order that the measures will be removed.
attributes.background: Restricting the liberty of large parts of the population without providing an adequate explanation/ evidence of the reasons why the measures are being introduced is undemocratic and violates human rights legislation.
